name: transformice-electron
description: A cross-platform Transformice standalone app running on Electron.

scripts.winpkg32: electron-packager . Transformice --platform win32 --arch ia32 --out dist/ --ignore "(.git|dist|flash-plugin-others|node_modules/electron.*)" --icon resources/icon.png --overwrite
scripts.macpkg64: electron-packager . Transformice --platform darwin --arch x64 --out dist/ --ignore "(.git|dist|flash-plugin-others|node_modules/electron.*)" --icon resources/icon.png --overwrite
scripts.lnxpkg64: electron-packager . Transformice --platform linux --arch x64 --out dist/ --ignore "(.git|dist|flash-plugin-others|node_modules/electron.*)" --icon resources/icon.png --overwrite
scripts.winpkg64: electron-packager . Transformice --platform win32 --arch x64 --out dist/ --ignore "(.git|dist|flash-plugin-others|node_modules/electron.*)" --icon resources/icon.png --overwrite

author: cngc4e
